[C] Your other '"Beginning of a New Life" Rudeus' and '"Sword Training" Paul' gain +1000 Power.
[A] BOND / '"Beginning of a New Life" Rudeus' or '"Sword Training" Paul' [Discard a card from hand]

[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters and return it to your hand.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] All your other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose a card in Level Zone and a ::Six-Sided World:: Character in your Waiting Room and Swap them.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] CX COMBO EXPERIENCE When this Attacks, if "From Master to Disciple" is in your Climax Zone and the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 2 or higher, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Six-Sided World:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, put the remaining cards in your Waiting Room, and for the turn this gains +1500 Power.
--None--
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters.
[A] During this card's Battle, if Damage you are dealt is cancelled, you may return this to your hand.

[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 6 or higher, this gains +1000 Power and cannot be chosen as target of Opponent's effects.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Six-Sided World:: Characters.

If you don't have a ::Six-Sided World:: Character, you cannot play this from hand.
Choose and perform 1 of the following 2 effects.
"Search your Library for up to 1 ::Six-Sided World:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and Shuffle your Library."
"Choose 1 of your ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn it gains +3500 Power. That Character does not Stand during your next Stand Phase."
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Six-Sided World:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, your Opponent may put the top 2 cards of their Stock in the Waiting Room. If they do, for the turn, this cannot Front Attack.

[C] During your Opponent's turn, this gains +1000 Power for each of your other Back Row ::Six-Sided World:: Characters.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters.

[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your hand, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty Front Row Center Slot.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 6 or higher, this gains +1500 Power.

[A] CX COMBO When "Little Mage" is placed in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Six-Sided World:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room."
[S] [(1) Discard a '"Genius Swordfighter" Paul' from hand to the Waiting Room, Rest 2 of your ::Six-Sided World:: Characters] Choose up to 2 Characters with ::Maid:: and/or ::Sister (Sst-MTI):: and return them to hand.

[C] Your other '"Adventuring Party Dead End" Eris' and '"Adventuring Party Dead End" Ruijerd' gains +2000 Power and the following ability. "[C] This cannot be chosen by your Opponent's effects".
[A] [(1) Rest 2 Characters] Put top 2 card of your deck into your Waiting Room, choose one of ::Six-Sided World:: character with level X or lower, and return back to your hand. X is the total level of those cards.

[A] CX COMBO [Discard a '"Magical Talent" Rudeus' from your hand to the Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if there is no Climax in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "From Master to Disciple", place it to your Climax Zone, and Shuffle your Library.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] If '"What You Can Offer" Roxy' is in your Back Row, this gains +3000 Power and +1 Soul.

"[A] When this card's Damage is Cancelled, until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains +4000 Power."

[A] [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room] This ability activates up to once per turn. During this card's Battle, when Damage you have received is Cancelled, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If that card has a Soul Trigger Icon, you may pay cost. If so, deal the same amount of Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

Perform the following 3 effects once in any order.
"Choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and either Stand it and move it to an empty Slot on your Opponent's Stage, or choose another of your Opponent's Characters and Stand and Swap both Characters."
"Place all of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room, and place the same number of cards from the top of their Library to their Stock."
"Choose a Climax in your Opponent's Waiting Room, then put all cards in their Waiting Room other than the chosen card into their Library and your Opponent Shuffles their Library."
